name: Sunday Morning Groovin
description:
The initial launch is finally out on Itch.io! 

Gameplay currently includes 9 weeks and 2 bonus weeks, over 25 skins for customizable characters, 7 settings, and a loaded credits page! 

None of the music is officially created by me, but most of the artwork and sprites are done by me or my close friends. More information can be seen on the aforementioned credits page. This is meant to be a project done solely for fun, not for monetary gain!

If you would like to contact us, Discord contact information is also on the credits page.

The controls are WASD or arrow keys to navigate the menus, and space or enter to confirm a selection or pause a song mid-way. You can also click the 7 key to open the debug menu in the middle of a song. To change the volume, use the + or - keys to adjust it as needed.

ATTENTION: Your high scores, cosmetics, and other saved player information will reset with each update because of itch.io's upload procedure. To keep all of your data secure, please download the WIN version if possible.

For now, you may use this link to access a version of the game that saves your data through each update. However, once it hits a 100 MB threshold, it will not be able to be updated any longer.
